item.title: New prototype made with Svelte
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
onsummer), but i decided to start from scretch… Works without any server! JamStack, static pages, prerendered, precompressed, hydrated via API, distributed via CDN. GZip compresses the app from 4,3MB to only 1,02 MB!!! I almost got it working, that the globe also comes back after tabclose (without internet connection) browser-friendly JavaScript with small package sizes. Short: Cloud Atlas will...

Source

item.title: We are paving the way to TRUE P2P
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Lets redecentralize the web - The Revolution Will Not Be Televised...
item.content:encoded:
Mishmesh is the result of a really cool, days long conversation of Dreader and me. He had already something similar in mind for some time, so great we found each other. My special thanks to him for sharing his whole decentralization experience, making the TRUE-P2P transport layer a 70 rows application (for now) with around 30 rows for each adapter. https://github.com/worldpeaceenginelabs/

Source

item.content:encoded:

item.title: We are getting Community support for the decentralized map tile server…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Dropped a request at the Cesium Community Forum, and Ohad offered immediately his help with creating a repository, that is the blueprint for a pipeline to produce map tiles...

item.title: The Cloud Atlas Live Demo is online…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Finally, we have a running Live Demo. There are changes published every day, so keep watching...
item.content:encoded:
https://cloud-atlas.org/ to stay up to date… (The Google login works, Facebook and Apple are disabled for now)...

item.title: Cesium just made the globe available in Unreal Engine
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description:
That was exactly what we were waiting for...
Now we are working on both the most famous game development engines available.

item.title: The first two coders donating their time…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description:
Wow!
That went so much faster than I thought. I applied with the Cloud Atlas on Code for Social Good and immediately got two applicants, supporting our cause.
item.content:encoded:
That went so much faster than I thought. I applied with the Cloud Atlas on Code for Social Good and immediately got two applicants, supporting our cause.
